title: Personalized Instructional Design for Circulatory System Learning: Long-Term Program for Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic life science terminology and general knowledge of human anatomy
context.additional_context: Emphasizing case-based learning linked to in-service practitioners' work, with mandatory smartphone-based learning activities.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the main components and functions of the circulatory system in connection with practical case studies.
Learners can simulate the blood circulation process using personalized animated content.
Learners can propose solutions to circulatory system-related practical problems through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
